## Summary (Required)
- What changed and why?
- Link the driving task/issue (`T-#####`, issue URL, or both).

## Change Type (Required)
- [ ] Bug fix
- [ ] Feature
- [ ] Refactor
- [ ] Docs/Workflow

## Testing Evidence (Required)
- Commands run (for example: `npm run lint`, `npm run test`, targeted tests)
- Results and noteworthy coverage/regression notes

## Risks and Rollback (Required)
- Main risks introduced by this change
- Rollback plan if deploy/release validation fails

## Reviewer Focus Areas (Required)
- 1-3 areas where reviewers should spend most attention

## References (Optional)
- Research links, design docs, specs, incident docs

## Additional Context (Optional)
- Screenshots, migration notes, operational follow-ups
